title: Slow the spread without giving up privacy
desc: Covid Tracer is a community-led movement to develop free, open-source, privacy-by-design tools for individuals, public health officials, and larger communities to flatten the curve of COVID-19, reduce fear, and prevent a surveillance-state response to the pandemic.Coming soon on........

features.title: A Faster and More Accurate Patient Interview
features.description: Instead of relying on memory, diagnosed patients can opt to provide their 28-day Covid Tracer location trail to their health official.

features.title: Personal Information is Fully Removed
features.description: Using the covid tracer dashboard, the health official redacts personally identifiable information from the location trail.

features.title: Be Notified if you've Crossed Paths
features.description: Patient's redacted and blurred location trail is released. Covid Tracer notifies users who came in close contact with a diagnosed patient. Healthy user's data never leaves their phone.
